MeasureClass - Class in project.context.localization.common.superclasses
The Measure class offers a convenient method MeasureClass.measureWiFi() to start measuring a user's WiFi surrounding and define Fingerprints by MeasureClass.setPlaceString(String) After a predefined scan count MeasureClass.setScanCountMax(int), the measurements are saved in the database.
MeasureClass(Activity) - Constructor for class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Instantiates a new Measure class.
measureWiFi() - Method in class project.context.localization.common.superclasses.MeasureClass
Initiates the measuring process.

Returns the minimum entry of the placeDistanceMap
